required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Mesylate Imatinib Capsule in Chronic Myeloid Leukemia Body
clinical_study.official_title: Bioequivalence Study of Mesylate Imatinib Capsule in Chronic Myeloid Leukemia Body

brief_summary.textblock:
1. purpose: To conduct the relative bioavailability study of a single dose and multiple doses of imatinib mesylate capsule (Jiangsu Chia-Tai Tianqing Pharmacy Co. Ltd.) versus Glivec (Novartis Pharma Stein AG).
2. Experimental Design： Two-period crossover design
3. Test drug: imatinib mesylate capsule Reference drug: Glivec
4. Sample size：20

detailed_description.textblock: To conduct the relative bioavailability study of a single dose and multiple doses of imatinib mesylate capsule(Jiangsu Chia-Tai Tianqing Pharmacy Co. Ltd.) versus Glivec (Novartis Pharma Stein AG) and compare the bioequivalence and pharmacokinetics of the two products in 20 patients with chronic myeloid leukemia.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Bio-equivalence Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under Curve (AUC) Time Frame: predose, 0.5,1,1.5,2,3,5,8,12,24,48,72hours post-dose

arm_group.description: Single and multiple oral mesylate imatinib capsule 400mg qd
Single and multiple oral Glivec 400mg qd

intervention.description: Single and multiple oral mesylate imatinib capsule 400mg qd
Single and multiple oral Glivec 400mg qd

overall_official.affiliation: Shanghai Jiaotong University School of Medicine Ruijin Hospital

facility.name: Shanghai Jiaotong University School of Medicine Ruijin Hospital
